author: Staff Reporter
text:
A retired State government official was killed when a water tanker rammed his motorcycle from behind as he was riding on Medavakkam Main Road in Nanmangalam here on Saturday.

The deceased K. Venkataraman, 68, a retired official of the Public Works Department and a resident of Veeramani Nagar First Main Road, was on his way back home, after recharging his mobile phone at a shop near the bus stop.

The accident took place around 4.30 p.m. and he died on the spot after and he came under the wheels of the heavy vehicle, said police sources.

The St. Thomas Mount traffic investigation wing police removed the body to the Tambaram taluk government hospital at Chromepet and launched a hunt for the lorry driver who abandoned the vehicle and fled the scene.
title: Retired govt. official killed in road accident
